Aqua.DESCRIPTION: Playing [A-G] cards on targets with [Aqua] increases damage they take and decreases damage they deal.
Aqua.NAME: Aqua

Blasted.DESCRIPTION: Take damage at the start of turn, then reduce stacks in half.
Blasted.NAME: Blasted

Charge.DESCRIPTION: Apply the last #yElemental #yDebuff you manually leveled up to an enemy. The first time each turn you level up an #yElemental #yDebuff manually, gain #b1 #yCharge.
Charge.NAME: Charge

Corrosion.DESCRIPTION: [A-P] #yElemental #yDebuff. When #yAttacking, deal a portion of damage dealt to yourself and ALL allies.
Corrosion.NAME: Corrosion

Death.DESCRIPTION: Your #yAttacks deal a portion of its damage to yourself. At the end of turn, you have a chance of instantly dying.
Death.NAME: Death

Elemental Debuff.DESCRIPTION: [Ignis], [Aqua], [Ventus], [Petra]. Playing cards on targets with these debuffs triggers #yReactions. Remove at the end of the round.
Elemental Debuff.NAME: Elemental Debuff

Elemental Mastery.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you would gain #yAura stacks or apply #yElemental #yDebuffs, increase their stacks.
Elemental Mastery.NAME: Elemental Mastery

Flow.DESCRIPTION: During your turn, spend #b{0} [Flow] to draw a card.
Flow.NAME: Flow

Frostbite.DESCRIPTION: Every #b{0} stacks increases damage taken and reduces damage dealt by #b1. At round end, reduce stacks by #b75%.
Frostbite.NAME: Frostbite

Ignis.DESCRIPTION: Playing [A-B] cards on targets with [Ignis] damages them at the start of their turn.
Ignis.NAME: Ignis

Lux.DESCRIPTION: [A-Y] #yElemental #yDebuff. Reactions on the target are multiplied.
Lux.NAME: Lux

Matter.DESCRIPTION: #yReactions grant #yMatter. Can be spent to level #yElemental #yDebuffs.
Matter.NAME: Matter

Petra.DESCRIPTION: Playing [A-R] cards on targets with [Petra] grant you [Block].
Petra.NAME: Petra

Reaction.DESCRIPTION: Occurs upon playing a card with an #yAffinity that activates the target's #yElemental #yDebuff. This also grants #yMatter.
Reaction.NAME: Reaction

Tether.DESCRIPTION: Activates if the #ySummon in front of it meets the given condition.
Tether.NAME: Tether

Umbra.DESCRIPTION: [A-P] #yElemental #yDebuff. Reactions on a non-#ySummon target applies a debuff that causes its #yAttacks to damage itself.
Umbra.NAME: Umbra

Ventus.DESCRIPTION: Playing [A-O] cards on targets with [Ventus] grants charges to be used during your turn to draw cards.
Ventus.NAME: Ventus
